description:
GeneralInstaller
General WPF Installer and General Config tool

This package contains 2 modules, first is the general installer which can be driven by a CSV file, the other one is a general config tool which takes advantage of SQLite 3 to store interprocess configure items in just one table.

How to use General Installer:
1. create a CSV file with all modules defined, you can reference to InstallerConfig.csv as attached, every item just are literally, like what all inside the CSV:
Platform,32
FolderUnderProgramFiles,PatrickGamp
ItemCountToInstall,6
Item1Name,GeneralSQLite
Item1AssemblyName,GeneralSQLiteOp_v2.COM.DLL
Item1CustomizedFolder,False
Item2Name,GeneralSQLiteUI
Item2AssemblyName,GeneralSQLiteOp.UICOM.DLL
Item2CustomizedFolder,False
Item3Name,GeneralSQLiteApp
Item3AssemblyName,GeneralSQLite.WpfManager.EXE
Item3CustomizedFolder,False
Item4Name,GeneralConfig_v2
Item4AssemblyName,GeneralConfig_v2.COM.DLL
Item4CustomizedFolder,False
Item5Name,GeneralConfigUI
Item5AssemblyName,GeneralConfig_v2.UICOM.DLL
Item5CustomizedFolder,False
Item6Name,GeneralConfigApp
Item6AssemblyName,GeneralConfig_v2.WpfManager.EXE
Item6CustomizedFolder,False
EULA,EULA.txt
2, specify which CSV file takes effect when installing, just set the only configure item in GeneralInstall.exe.config
3, run GeneralInstall.exe, it will extract all items in the sub folders named as each Item1Name, Item2Name, etc. and register COM components if its assembly name has extension of DLL, or register App if the extension is EXE.

The other package General Config consists of 3 sub modules:
1. database operate module GeneralConfig_v2.COM.dll which is a COM component
2. management UI module GeneralConfig_v2.UICOM.dll which is also a COM component with WPF implementaion
3. GeneralConfig_v2.WpfManager is the app which will call the above 2 COMs

General Config takes reference to existing NuGET packages:
1. GeneralSQLiteViewer, current version is higher because editors are also included
2. CSVMultilang

Both have the dependencies SQLite 3 and Microsoft.WindowsAPICodePack, appreciate to provide the functionalities.

One more thing, GeneralInstaller has complete multilang, however GeneralConfig is incomplete. The install bits is under sub folder 'assets'.

Author
Patrick Gamp

For technique support or business, please call the cell phone ++0086-18603016232, email: patrickgamp@hotmail.com, WeChat(A Chinese popular chat app) id is same to the cell phone number

In 2005-2018, worked for Microsoft Windows Mobile and Windows Phone developing team, XBox One manufacturing automation team, and Surface imaging test team, after 2019, opened a small automation software corporation at the first strong manufacturing city in the world - Suzhou, China. If you have some industry automation related software project to oursource, or any Windows desktop based non-Web softare developing requirements, please send me email to contact.

Published date
December 11, 2023
